name: Time Bomb (Swifty Software)
overview: Time Bomb is an action game where you need to rescue sixteen ammunition depots from bombs that are set to explode. You may have landmines placed in your path, while aircraft can also attack from overhead. The game has five difficulty levels, which determine how many landmines are in your path. You can also choose between a daytime mission or a night mission. At night, visibility is low, and you need to use sound cues to avoid hazards.
